reviewText: Very disappointed. Cant play them. British settings? Can I get a refund? Not for this country. Didt know that when purchased.
disappointed.,will never order again the DVD that I bought.
It Wouldn't play in an American DVD player. I gave it as a gift, and the recipient was very upset about it.
I have always enjoyed watching Keeping Up Appearances.  British comedies are very enjoyable to watch.  I first became acquainted with them on PBS.

Ignorance is bliss. The cover looks great! I can vaguely remember the episodes from
when I first watched them years ago...by the looks of it that is about as far as this purchase
will go. The dvds are only compat with a UK player. Maybe next Christmas I will order one.
